title: Reapers, Inc.- Dark Souls
description: In the third installment to the "Reapers, Inc." series, nothing has been routine at the Reapers, Inc. office. Mama Dee has been in charge while Brigit recovered from injury. When she takes on a task that leads to more chaos, the Reapers are charged with cleaning up the mess. Aided by two Immortals, Brigit, John and the others must race to corral the dark souls that have escaped their fates in Hell before they can wreak havoc on the living.
author: B.L. Newport
